query.sql:
select ac_base_mac,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,alarmlevel,alarmnum,rownumber 
FROM (
  SELECT ac_base_mac,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, '严重' as alarmlevel, critical as alarmnum, 1 as rownumber from ac_alarm_statistics WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT ac_base_mac,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, '重要' as alarmlevel, major as alarmnum, 2 as rownumber from ac_alarm_statistics WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
 SELECT ac_base_mac,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, '一般' as alarmlevel, normal as alarmnum, 3 as rownumber from ac_alarm_statistics WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT ac_base_mac,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, '警告' as alarmlevel, warn as alarmnum, 4 as rownumber from ac_alarm_statistics WHERE 1=1
) distribution;
select ac_base_mac,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,critical,major,normal,warn from ac_alarm_statistics WHERE 1=1

select ac_base_mac,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,
ac_ip,ac_if_type,ac_if_mac,ac_if_ipv4,ac_if_index,ac_if_name,
avgifrxrate,
maxifrxrate,
minifrxrate,
avgiftxrate,
maxiftxrate,
miniftxrate,
round(CAST(CAST(avgifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avgifrxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(maxifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) maxifrxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(minifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) minifrxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(avgiftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avgiftxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(maxiftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) maxiftxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(miniftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) miniftxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(avgifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avgifrxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(maxifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) maxifrxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(minifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) minifrxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(avgiftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avgiftxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(maxiftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) maxiftxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(miniftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) miniftxrate_mbps,
total_if_in_bytes,
total_if_out_bytes,
avg_if_in_bytes,
avg_if_out_bytes,
round(CAST(CAST(total_if_in_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) as total_if_in_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(total_if_out_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) as total_if_out_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(avg_if_in_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) as avg_if_in_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(avg_if_out_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) as avg_if_out_bytes_mb
from ac_int_traffic_rate_trend where 1=1

SELECT userid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,acnum,growthacnum
from ac_statistic where 1=1

select 
ac_base_mac,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,ac_ip,
avgifrxrate,
maxifrxrate,
minifrxrate,
avgiftxrate,
maxiftxrate,
miniftxrate,
total_if_in_bytes,
total_if_out_bytes,
avg_if_in_bytes,
avg_if_out_bytes,
round(CAST(CAST(avgifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avgifrxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(maxifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) maxifrxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(minifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) minifrxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(avgiftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avgiftxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(maxiftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) maxiftxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(miniftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) miniftxrate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(avgifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avgifrxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(maxifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) maxifrxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(avgiftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avgiftxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(maxiftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) maxiftxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(minifrxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) minifrxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(miniftxrate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) miniftxrate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(total_if_in_bytes AS DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) as total_if_in_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(total_if_out_bytes AS DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) as total_if_out_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(avg_if_in_bytes AS DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) as avg_if_in_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(avg_if_out_bytes AS DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) as avg_if_out_bytes_mb 
from ac_traffic_rate_trend where 1=1

select ac_base_mac,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,ac_ip,
round(cast(avgcpuusage*100 as numeric ), 2) as avgcpuusage,
round(cast(maxcpuusage*100 as numeric ), 2) as maxcpuusage,
round(cast(mincpuusage*100 as numeric ), 2) as mincpuusage,
round(cast(avgmemusage*100 as numeric ), 2) as avgmemusage,
round(cast(maxmemusage*100 as numeric ), 2) as maxmemusage,
round(cast(minmemusage*100 as numeric ), 2) as minmemusage,
round(cast(avgdiskusage*100 as numeric ), 2) as avgdiskusage,
round(cast(maxdiskusage*100 as numeric ), 2) as maxdiskusage,
round(cast(mindiskusage*100 as numeric ), 2) as mindiskusage 
from ac_usage_stats WHERE 1=1

select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,alarmlevel,alarmnum,rownumber
FROM (
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, '严重' as alarmlevel, critical as alarmnum, 1 as rownumber from ap_alarm_statistics WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, '重要' as alarmlevel, major as alarmnum, 2 as rownumber from ap_alarm_statistics WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, '一般' as alarmlevel, normal as alarmnum, 3 as rownumber from ap_alarm_statistics WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, '警告' as alarmlevel, warn as alarmnum, 4 as rownumber from ap_alarm_statistics WHERE 1=1
  ) distribution
select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,critical,major,normal,warn from ap_alarm_statistics WHERE 1=1

SELECT 
t1.areaid, UPPER(CAST(t1.ap_base_mac as VARCHAR)) as ap_base_mac, t1.ap_base_device_type,
 t1.areainfo ->> 'level1Id' as level1id,
 t1.areainfo ->> 'level1Name' as level1Name,
 t1.areainfo ->> 'level2Id' as level2id,
 t1.areainfo ->> 'level2Name' as level2Name,
 t1.areainfo ->> 'level3Id' as level3Id,
 t1.areainfo ->> 'level3Name' as level3Name,
t1.hour, t1.day, t1.weekstart, t1.weekend, t1.month, t1.year, t1.datatype,
t2.total_alarm
FROM ap_alarm_top10 t1 
LEFT JOIN 
(
SELECT ap_base_mac, ap_base_device_type,SUM(total_alarm) total_alarm
FROM ap_alarm_top10 
WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY ap_base_mac, ap_base_device_type
) t2
ON t1.ap_base_mac=t2.ap_base_mac AND t1.ap_base_device_type=t2.ap_base_device_type
WHERE 1=1

select 
areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,
avgapnum,avgofflineapnum,maxofflineapnum,minofflineapnum,
avgofflinerate,
maxofflinerate,
minofflinerate,
round(cast(avgofflinerate*100 as numeric ), 2) avgofflinerate100,
round(cast(maxofflinerate*100 as numeric ), 2) maxofflinerate100,
round(cast(minofflinerate*100 as numeric ), 2) minofflinerate100
from ap_offline_trend where 1=1

select 
ac_base_mac,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,ac_ip,avgapnum,maxapnum,minapnum
from ap_onac_online_trend where 1=1

select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsamplenumber,clientnumrange,apnum,rownumber
FROM (
 SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsamplenumber, '<5' as clientnumrange, clientnumrange1 as apnum,1 as rownumber from ap_online_client_distribution WHERE 1=1 and totalsamplenumber >0
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsamplenumber, '5-10' as clientnumrange, clientnumrange2 as apnum,2 as rownumber  from ap_online_client_distribution WHERE 1=1 and totalsamplenumber >0
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsamplenumber, '10-20' as clientnumrange, clientnumrange3 as apnum,3 as rownumber  from ap_online_client_distribution WHERE 1=1 and totalsamplenumber >0
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsamplenumber, '20-30' as clientnumrange, clientnumrange4 as apnum,4 as rownumber  from ap_online_client_distribution WHERE 1=1 and totalsamplenumber >0
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsamplenumber, '30-50' as clientnumrange, clientnumrange5 as apnum,5 as rownumber  from ap_online_client_distribution WHERE 1=1 and totalsamplenumber >0
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, totalsamplenumber,'50-60' as clientnumrange, clientnumrange6 as apnum,6 as rownumber  from ap_online_client_distribution WHERE 1=1 and totalsamplenumber >0
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsamplenumber, '≥60' as clientnumrange, clientnumrange7 as apnum,7 as rownumber  from ap_online_client_distribution WHERE 1=1 and totalsamplenumber >0
) distribution;

expressions.exp: round(CAST((CAST(sum(apnum) as DECIMAL) / CAST(sum(totalsamplenumber) as DECIMAL)) * 100 as DECIMAL), 2)

query.sql:
select 
areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,avgapnum,maxapnum,minapnum
from ap_online_trend where 1=1

select 
areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,
statoap_rx_24g_data_bytes,
aptosta_tx_24g_data_bytes,
statoap_rx_5g_data_bytes,
aptosta_tx_5g_data_bytes,
round(CAST(CAST(statoap_rx_24g_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) statoap_rx_24g_data_bytes_kb,
round(CAST(CAST(aptosta_tx_24g_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) aptosta_tx_24g_data_bytes_kb,
round(CAST(CAST(statoap_rx_5g_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) statoap_rx_5g_data_bytes_kb,
round(CAST(CAST(aptosta_tx_5g_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) aptosta_tx_5g_data_bytes_kb,
round(CAST(CAST(statoap_rx_24g_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) statoap_rx_24g_data_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(aptosta_tx_24g_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) aptosta_tx_24g_data_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(statoap_rx_5g_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) statoap_rx_5g_data_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(aptosta_tx_5g_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) aptosta_tx_5g_data_bytes_mb
from ap_radio_traffic_rate_trend where 1=1

select userid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,
apenablenum,apdisablenum,apnum,growthapnum,circular_growth_ratio 
from ap_statistic where 1=1

select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,clientnumrange,apnum ,rownumber
FROM (
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '<5' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '<10' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '<20' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '<50' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '<100' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  1 as rownumber,
  clientnumrange1 as apnum from ap_total_client_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '5-10' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '10-20' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '20-50' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '50-100' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '100-200' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  2 as rownumber,
  clientnumrange2 as apnum from ap_total_client_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '10-20' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '20-50' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '50-100' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '100-200' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '200-500' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  3 as rownumber,
  clientnumrange3 as apnum from ap_total_client_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '20-50' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '50-100' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '100-200' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '200-500' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '500-1000' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  4 as rownumber,
  clientnumrange4 as apnum from ap_total_client_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '50-100' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '100-200' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '200-500' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '500-1000' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '1000-2000' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  5 as rownumber,
  clientnumrange5 as apnum from ap_total_client_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '100-200' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '200-500' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '500-1000' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '1000-2000' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '2000-5000' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  6 as rownumber,
  clientnumrange6 as apnum from ap_total_client_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '≥200' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '≥500'  
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '≥1000'  
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '≥2000'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '≥5000'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  7 as rownumber,
  clientnumrange7 as apnum from ap_total_client_distribution WHERE 1=1
) distribution

select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,apnumrange,apnum,rownumber
FROM (
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '<50MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '<100MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '<500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '<1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '<5GB' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  1 as rownumber,
  apnumrange1 as apnum from ap_wirless_rx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '50-100MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '100-500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '500MB-1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '5-10GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  2 as rownumber,
  apnumrange2 as clientnum from ap_wirless_rx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '100-500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '500MB-1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '10-50GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  3 as rownumber,
  apnumrange3 as clientnum from ap_wirless_rx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '500MB-1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '10-50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '50-100GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  4 as rownumber,
  apnumrange4 as clientnum from ap_wirless_rx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '10-50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '50-100GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '100-500GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  5 as rownumber,
  apnumrange5 as clientnum from ap_wirless_rx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '10-50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '50-100GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '100-500GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '500GB-1TB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  6 as rownumber,
  apnumrange6 as clientnum from ap_wirless_rx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '≥10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '≥50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '≥100GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '≥500GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '≥1TB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  7 as rownumber,
  apnumrange7 as clientnum from ap_wirless_rx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
) distribution

select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,apnumrange,apnum,rownumber
FROM (
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '<50MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '<100MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '<500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '<1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '<5GB' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  1 as rownumber,
  apnumrange1 as apnum from ap_wirless_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '50-100MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '100-500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '500MB~1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '5-10GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  2 as rownumber,
  apnumrange2 as clientnum from ap_wirless_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '100-500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '500MB-1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '10-50GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  3 as rownumber,
  apnumrange3 as clientnum from ap_wirless_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '500MB-1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '10-50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '50-100GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  4 as rownumber,
  apnumrange4 as clientnum from ap_wirless_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '10-50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '50-100GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '100-500GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  5 as rownumber,
  apnumrange5 as clientnum from ap_wirless_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '10-50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '50-100GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '100-500GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '500GB-1TB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  6 as rownumber,
  apnumrange6 as clientnum from ap_wirless_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '≥10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '≥50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '≥100GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '≥500GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '≥1TB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  7 as rownumber,
  apnumrange7 as clientnum from ap_wirless_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
) distribution

SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,
statoap_rx_data_bytes,
aptosta_tx_data_bytes,
avg_statoap_rx_data_bytes,
avg_aptosta_tx_data_bytes,
round(CAST(CAST(statoap_rx_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) statoap_rx_data_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(aptosta_tx_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) aptosta_tx_data_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(avg_statoap_rx_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avg_statoap_rx_data_bytes_mb,
round(CAST(CAST(avg_aptosta_tx_data_bytes as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avg_aptosta_tx_data_bytes_mb
FROM ap_wirless_traffic_trend WHERE 1=1

select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,apnumrange,apnum,rownumber
FROM (
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '<50MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '<100MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '<500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '<1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '<5GB' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  1 as rownumber,
  apnumrange1 as apnum from ap_wirless_tx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '50-100MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '100-500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '500MB-1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '5-10GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  2 as rownumber,
  apnumrange2 as clientnum from ap_wirless_tx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '100-500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '500MB-1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '10-50GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  3 as rownumber,
  apnumrange3 as clientnum from ap_wirless_tx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '500MB-1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '10-50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '50-100GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  4 as rownumber,
  apnumrange4 as clientnum from ap_wirless_tx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '1-5GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '5-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '10-50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '50-100GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '100-500GB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  5 as rownumber,
  apnumrange5 as clientnum from ap_wirless_tx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '5G-10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '10-50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '50-100GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '100-500GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '500GB-1TB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  6 as rownumber,
  apnumrange6 as clientnum from ap_wirless_tx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '≥10GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '≥50GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '≥100GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '≥500GB'  
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '≥1TB'  
         ELSE 'other' END
      as apnumrange, 
  7 as rownumber,
  apnumrange7 as clientnum from ap_wirless_tx_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
) distribution

select 
concat(arealevel,'级区域') as arealevel,
userid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,(areanum - growthareanum) as areanum,growthareanum,
round(CAST(circular_growth_ratio*100 as DECIMAL ), 2) circular_growth_ratio 
from area_statistic where 1=1

select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,sessionnumrange,sessionnum,rownumber,avgsesonlinetime,totalsessionnum
FROM (
SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,avgsesonlinetime,totalsessionnum,
'<1min' as sessionnumrange, 
'01' as rownumber,
sessionnum1 as sessionnum from client_connect_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, avgsesonlinetime,totalsessionnum,
'1-5min' as sessionnumrange, 
'02' as rownumber,
abs(0-sessionnum2-sessionnum3-sessionnum4-sessionnum5) as sessionnum from client_connect_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, avgsesonlinetime,totalsessionnum,
'5-10min' as sessionnumrange, 
'03' as rownumber,
abs(0-sessionnum6-sessionnum7-sessionnum8) as sessionnum from client_connect_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, avgsesonlinetime,totalsessionnum,
'10-20min' as sessionnumrange, 
'04' as rownumber,
abs(0-sessionnum9-sessionnum10) as sessionnum from client_connect_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, avgsesonlinetime,totalsessionnum,
'20-30min' as sessionnumrange, 
'05' as rownumber,
sessionnum11 as sessionnum from client_connect_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, avgsesonlinetime,totalsessionnum,
'30-60min' as sessionnumrange, 
'06' as rownumber,
sessionnum12 as sessionnum from client_connect_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, avgsesonlinetime,totalsessionnum,
'≥60min' as sessionnumrange, 
'07' as rownumber,
sessionnum13 as sessionnum from client_connect_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
) distribution

expressions.exp: COALESCE(round(CAST((CAST(sum(sessionnum) as DECIMAL) / CAST(NULLIF(sum(totalsessionnum), 0) as DECIMAL)) * 100 as DECIMAL), 2), 0)

query.sql:
select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,clientnumrange,clientnum,rownumber
FROM (
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype in (1,2,3) THEN '<5min' 
         WHEN datatype in (4,5)   THEN '<30min'
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  1 as rownumber,
  clientrange1 as clientnum from client_online_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype in (1)   THEN '5-10min' 
         WHEN datatype in (2,3) THEN '5-30min'
         WHEN datatype in (4,5) THEN '30min-1h'
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  2 as rownumber,
  clientrange2 as clientnum from client_online_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype in (1) THEN '10-15min' 
         WHEN datatype in (2,3)   THEN '30min-1h'
         WHEN datatype in (4)   THEN '1-10h'
         WHEN datatype in (5)   THEN '1h-1d'
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  3 as rownumber,
  clientrange3 as clientnum from client_online_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '15-20min' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '1-2h' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '1-10h' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '10h-1d' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '1-5d' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  4 as rownumber,
  clientrange4 as clientnum from client_online_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '20-30min' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '2-5h' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '10h-1d' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '1-2d' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '5-10d' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  5 as rownumber,
  clientrange5 as clientnum from client_online_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '30-40min' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '5-10h' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '1-2d' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '2-5d' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '10-50d' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  6 as rownumber,
  clientrange6 as clientnum from client_online_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '≥40min' 
         WHEN datatype = 2 THEN '≥10h' 
         WHEN datatype = 3 THEN '≥2d' 
         WHEN datatype = 4 THEN '≥5d' 
         WHEN datatype = 5 THEN '≥50d' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  7 as rownumber,
  clientrange7 as clientnum from client_online_time_distribution WHERE 1=1
) distribution;
select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,maxclientnum,minclientnum,avgclientnum from client_online_trend WHERE 1=1

select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsessionnum,sessionnumrange,sessionnum,rownumber

SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsessionnum,

1 as rownumber,

sessionnum4 as sessionnum from client_rate_rx_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsessionnum,
'1-2Mbps' as sessionnumrange, 
5 as rownumber,
sessionnum5 as sessionnum from client_rate_rx_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsessionnum,
'2-5Mbps' as sessionnumrange, 
6 as rownumber,
sessionnum6 as sessionnum from client_rate_rx_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,totalsessionnum,
'≥5Mbps' as sessionnumrange, 
7 as rownumber,
sessionnum7 as sessionnum from client_rate_rx_distribution WHERE 1=1
) distribution

expressions.exp: round(CAST((CAST(sum(sessionnum) as DECIMAL) / CAST(sum(totalsessionnum) as DECIMAL)) * 100 as DECIMAL), 2)

select 
areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,
max_statoap_session_rx_data_rate,
min_statoap_session_rx_data_rate,
avg_statoap_session_rx_data_rate, 
round(CAST(CAST(max_statoap_session_rx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) max_statoap_session_rx_data_rate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(min_statoap_session_rx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) min_statoap_session_rx_data_rate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(avg_statoap_session_rx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avg_statoap_session_rx_data_rate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(min_statoap_session_rx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) min_statoap_session_rx_data_rate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(max_statoap_session_rx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) max_statoap_session_rx_data_rate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(avg_statoap_session_rx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avg_statoap_session_rx_data_rate_mbps
from client_rate_rx_trend where 1=1

select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,
max_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate,
min_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate,
avg_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate,
round(CAST(CAST(max_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) max_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(min_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) min_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(avg_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avg_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate_kbps,
round(CAST(CAST(max_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) max_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(avg_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) avg_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate_mbps,
round(CAST(CAST(min_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate as DECIMAL)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL ), 3) min_aptosta_session_tx_data_rate_mbps
from client_rate_tx_trend where 1=1

select areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,clientnumrange,clientnum,rownumber
FROM (
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype in (1,2,3,4,5) THEN '<1MB' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  1 as rownumber,
  clientrange1 as clientnum from client_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1   THEN '1-5MB' 
         WHEN datatype in (2,3,4,5) THEN '1-10MB' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  2 as rownumber,
  clientrange2 as clientnum from client_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '5-10MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2   THEN '10-50MB' 
         WHEN datatype in (3,4,5)   THEN '10-100MB' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  3 as rownumber,
  clientrange3 as clientnum from client_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '10-50MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2   THEN '50-100MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3   THEN '100-500MB' 
		 WHEN datatype in (4,5)   THEN '100MB-1GB' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  4 as rownumber,
  clientrange4 as clientnum from client_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '50-100MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2   THEN '100-500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3   THEN '500MB-1GB' 
		 WHEN datatype = 4   THEN '1G-5GB' 
		 WHEN datatype = 5   THEN '1G-10GB' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  5 as rownumber,
  clientrange5 as clientnum from client_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '100-500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2   THEN '500MB-1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3   THEN '1-5GB' 
		 WHEN datatype = 4   THEN '5-10GB' 
		 WHEN datatype = 5   THEN '10-50GB' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  6 as rownumber,
  clientrange6 as clientnum from client_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '≥500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2   THEN '≥1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3   THEN '≥5GB' 
		 WHEN datatype = 4   THEN '≥10GB' 
		 WHEN datatype = 5   THEN '≥50GB' 
         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  7 as rownumber,
  clientrange7 as clientnum from client_traffic_distribution WHERE 1=1
) distribution;

FROM (
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,

         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange, 
  6 as rownumber,
  clientrange6 as clientnum from client_traffic_rx_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '≥500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2   THEN '≥1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3   THEN '≥5GB' 
		 WHEN datatype = 4   THEN '≥10GB'

) distribution

select 
areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype,
aptosta_tx_data_bytes,
statoap_tx_data_bytes,

      as clientnumrange,

  clientrange6 as clientnum from client_traffic_tx_distribution WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
  SELECT areaid,hour,day,weekstart,weekend,month,year,datatype, 
    CASE WHEN datatype = 1 THEN '≥500MB' 
         WHEN datatype = 2   THEN '≥1GB' 
         WHEN datatype = 3   THEN '≥5GB'

         ELSE 'other' END
      as clientnumrange,
